content:
Hi, (hope this is a correct channel for this enquiry..) We are looking to map an ED (ER) Encounter from an EMR, where the Emergency Dept encounter has a few different start/stop timestamps - arrived/discharged; moved to Triage room / seeing a triage consultant; moved to a Bed. If two or three of these were recorded during an ED Encounter, how would we record it in FHIR - several .period entries? sub-encounters?

Thanks,
Alan.
